derivatives: -vid V.+ -vídya V. -véda V.+ -vedaka C. -vedin C. vedya B.+ védana V.+ -vedanīya C. védas V.+ véduka B. vitti AV.+ -vettavya C. -vettṛ E.+ védiṣṭha RV. védīyas RV. vidā́yya RV. -vinda B.+ -vindu V.B. -vindaka C. -vivitsu? E.

Doubtless originally the same with the preceding root. In some of their meanings, the two are so close together as hardly to be separable; and there are instances, from the Veda down, of exchanges of forms between them.
